thread.title: Kenya: Summit Offers Us Vital Lessons in Business
thread.title_full: Kenya: Summit Offers Us Vital Lessons in Business

title: Kenya: Summit Offers Us Vital Lessons in Business
text:
Kenya: #SomeoneTellCNN ... Get Outta Here! 
The summit has also given local entrepreneurs an opportunity to focus on the whole debate about the next generation of businessmen and what it will take us to develop a new crop of new risk-takers. 
This country has over the years developed strong entrepreneurs mainly as a result of the work of State-supported institutions that provided long-term capital and finance to budding business people -- the likes of ICDC, Kenya Industrial Estates, even the Agricultural Finance Corporation of Kenya. 
Today, the infrastructure for supporting budding entrepreneurs is almost non-existent. We do not have strong providers of long-term capital. In places where entrepreneurship has thrived, you will hear about strong private equity firms, big venture capital companies, and angel firms created to support risk-takers. 
In countries where successful entrepreneurship happens, you will see many cases where big corporates offer to incubate budding entrepreneurs until they grow into mature companies that can stand on their own. 
When the conference is over, we must find out how to make entrepreneurship central to economic policy in the coming years. Kenya
